content: Could anyone have a look at this? It's pretty simple and is a dependency of depth 5 of my Krein-Milman PR. (for anyone interested in this madness, the chain is Hahn-Banach #7288, Minkowski functional #9097, real.Inf of the scalar multiplication of a set, bounds of the scalar multiplication of a set #9078, monotonicity of scalar multiplication #9558)
cc @Bhavik Mehta :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
